targets.query: SELECT count(distinct("clustername")) AS "Clusters" FROM (SELECT "totalmhz_average", "clustername" FROM  "vsphere_cluster_cpu" WHERE $timeFilter)
SELECT count(distinct("vmname")) AS "VMs" FROM (SELECT "usage_average", "vmname" FROM  "vsphere_vm_cpu" WHERE $timeFilter)
SELECT last("used_latest") * (100 / last("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) , "source"  fill(none)
SELECT count(distinct("esxhostname")) AS "ESXi hosts" FROM (SELECT "coreUtilization_average", "esxhostname" FROM  "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE $timeFilter)
SELECT count(distinct("dsname")) AS "Datastores" FROM (SELECT "capacity_latest", "dsname" FROM  "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE $timeFilter)
SELECT last("usagemhz_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE ("clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "clustername" fill(none)

SELECT last("totalCapacity_average") * (last("usage_average")) / 100 * 1024 FROM "vsphere_host_mem" WHERE  ("clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "clustername"  fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT "bios-version" FROM "idrac-hosts" WHERE ("system-name" =~ /^$idrac_host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "system-name" LIMIT 1
SELECT last("n_users") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'PFS-01.lab.local') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT "log-dates" FROM "idrac-hosts" WHERE ("system-name" =~ /^$idrac_host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "log-number" LIMIT 1
SELECT "log-dates" FROM "idrac-hosts" WHERE ("system-name" =~ /^$idrac_host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "log-number" LIMIT 1

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE cpu !~ /cpu-total/
list.name: CPU
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE cpu !~ /cpu-total/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "idrac-hosts" WITH KEY="system-name"
list.name: idrac_host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "idrac-hosts" WITH KEY="system-name"

list.label: vCenter Server
list.name: vcenter
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM vsphere_host_cpu WITH KEY=vcenter

list.label: Datastore
list.name: datastore
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM vsphere_datastore_disk WITH KEY=source WHERE "vcenter" =~ /$vcenter/

list.label: Cluster
list.name: clustername
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM vsphere_host_cpu WITH KEY=clustername WHERE "vcenter" =~ /$vcenter/

list.label: PfSense
list.name: pfsense
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM cpu WITH KEY=host
